article_title: Write-in candidate for U.S. Senate hopes to ‘influence the debate’
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: A Missouri man who plans to run as an independent write-in candidate for U.S. Senate recently stopped by the St. James Leader-Journal office Wednesday (after calling a few weeks ahead), only wanting nine minutes of time to explain his platform and why he’s running.
article_metadata.author: Paul Hackbarth

og.description: A Missouri man who plans to run as an independent write-in candidate for U.S. Senate recently stopped by the St. James Leader-Journal office Wednesday
